title: Blossom Dream: Diamond, Pink Sapphire, and Rice Pearl Dangler Earrings
materials: 18K White and Rose Gold. Features Pink Sapphire (faceted cushion cut)
features: These elegant dangler earrings showcase a floral-inspired design. The earrings begin with a circular cluster of diamonds and pink sapphires. A delicate vine, pav√©-set with diamonds and highlighted with rose gold, cascades down. The design culminates in a cluster of luminous rice pearls embraced by diamond-studded petals of pink sapphires. The open setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, and the contrasting gold tones add depth and visual interest.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special occasions. Would be a lovely addition to a modern bride's trousseau.
description: These earrings perfectly blend modern design with the timeless beauty of natural gems. The combination of diamonds, pink sapphires, and rice pearls creates a luxurious and sophisticated look. The craftsmanship ensures durability and longevity, making them a cherished piece for generations to come. The open setting creates maximum sparkle.
